snippet: First-quarter earnings were reported a week after Comcast abandoned its planned takeover of Time Warner Cable
abstract: Time Warner Cable reports lower-than-expected first-quarter net income of $458 million, or $1.59 a share, down from $479 million, or $1.70 a share, in year-earlier period; report provides few clues about whether company will pursue new round of deal-making after Comcast abandoned takeover bid.
lead_paragraph: First-quarter earnings were reported a week after Comcast abandoned its planned takeover of Time Warner Cable

headline.main: Time Warner Cable Results Fall Short of Predictions
headline.print_headline: Results at Time Warner Cable Fall Short of Predictions
